local_intent: Complete the lowering-to-contact grasp of white_plate, secure with gripper, verify stability, and retreat.
assumptions: white_plate is within camera view and reachable
gripper is open at start of subtree execution
previous compute-grasp/align steps succeeded or are reproducible
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp-phase steps from the global tree: perceive white_plate, approach/align, lower until contact with retries, close gripper, verify grasp stability, and retreat.
